title: UthreatLocation

uthreatId.description: The unique ID of the uthreat from the system.

muted.description: True if uthreat has been muted.

associatedUthreatId.description: Used to link controller and drone.

description.description: Information about the threat. E.g. the manufacturer of the drone causing the threat.

x.description: East/west relative to mission center (cartesian coordinate) [m].

y.description: North/south relative to mission center (cartesian coordinate) [m].

cov.description: Covariance parameters. Defines the uncertainty of the location.

xx.description: xx element of the covariance matrix [m^2].

xy.description: xy element of the covariance matrix [m^2].

xz.description: xz element of the covariance matrix [m^2].

yy.description: yy element of the covariance matrix [m^2].

yz.description: yz element of the covariance matrix [m^2].

zz.description: zz element of the covariance matrix [m^2].

rfInfo.description: Collection of RF information of the threat

frequencyBands.description: The current frequency bands of the threat.

possibleBands.description: The possible frequency bands of the threat. This may contain more frequencies than 'frequencyBands' for threats, that are known to use multiple frequency bands.

uthreatBasis.description: Collection of threat detections related to this uthreat

createdTimeStamp.description: UTC time of creation of this uthreat.

updatedTimeStamp.description: UTC time of the last update of this uthreat. For a new threat this will be equal to createdTimeStamp. Stopping a uthreat counts as an update, and will update this time stamp. UthreatBasis time stamps are not updated when stopped.

stoppedTimeStamp.description: UTC time of stop of this uthreat. Only set when threat is stopped. Will be equal to updatedTimeStamp.
